name: Alien Abyss
description:
Alien Abyss

A small survival shooter game.

A lone astronaut has no choice but to dive into an abyss and clear out aliens.

Features
  • Arcade Survival Gameplay
  • Nice Pixel Art
  • Short Complete Experience
  • Personal Highscore
Controls Keyboard / Mouse MovementMouseShootLeft Mouse ButtonAimMouseToggle MusicMToggle SoundsS Known Issues
  • Some browsers have support issues

Created by Tom Stephenson & Will Stephenson for Ludum Dare 48:

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/alien-abyss Social
